Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Lamon
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Laramie, Addison, Cicero and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Lamon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Laramie, Addison, Cicero and Irving Park due to street blockage near Irving Park/Lamon.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kostner
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Kostner, Cermak, Pulaski and 26th due to street blockage near 26th and Kostner.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 26th, Kostner, Cermak, Pulaski and 26th, due to street blockage near 26th and Kostner.

Allow extra travel time.
